projects.title: Project GramaNiladari
projects.description: Grama Niladari is a platform which maintains ledger books and paper documents to record the data of people, has several concerns towards security, while searching or retrieving data.

projects.title: Project UniAcc
projects.description: UniAcc can help you compare prices across different areas in your destination city. Designed to provide students with a home away from home, UniAcc is a great student accommodation platform. It is an efficient online booking platform for monthly rentals of furnished housing options.
